review: WARNING: Check your internet speed before you purchase this item. I had it hard wired and it was the only device connected to the internet and I could not watch a movie without loading every 15 seconds. it said my internet was to slow but I have and LG streamer/blue ray player that works flawless with various other devices running on the net at the same time. I was highly disappointed and purchased another LG streamer for 36.00 and returned this item.

I will update if things get better, but this thing is probably going back to Amazon.Opened this Christmas morning 2014...  Really excited to try it out!  NO HDMI CABLE???  Seriously Amazon???
